metadata.title: CVE-2016-4973 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Binaries compiled against targets that use the libssp library in GCC forstack smashing protection (SSP) might allow local users to perform bufferoverflow attacks by leveraging lack of the Object Size Checking feature.

criterions.comment: mingw-w64: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
